Definitions.title: The Course details are as follows:
list: Courses Available: ProGrad provides a variety of Coding and Development related training courses. These include but are not necessarily limited to Microdegree in Programming course and Full Stack (MERN) Development Bootcamp course

Course Fees ("Fees"): Course Fees are specific to the respective courses and can vary periodically. The fees at the time of student enrolment will be specified by the Admission Counsellors, who are part of the Course Provider Team, and can also be found on the respective course page listings at the time of registration.
Course Duration: Course duration and schedule depends on the respective courses and will be defined on the respective course page listings.
Course Validity: By default, all courses are valid until a year from the last date of completion of the course schedule.

Course Details: The Courses on our platform, unless otherwise specified, are conducted online, and are mentor led.
You will receive access to a Mentor who will assist you with code reviews, project guidance, tech support and also to provide general guidance with various aspects of the Course.

Dedicated support from the Mentor team for technical issues and programming advice will be available on the team-communication platform Slack within the Code-Help channel. Official Timings: 10 AM to 7 PM - Mondays to Sundays except on public holidays.

The training program consists of a variety of learning elements that make up the Course experience. These may include interactive lessons on the Course platform, Code Labs, Solo Projects, Live group sessions (Huddles), interaction with peers and mentors on Slack, and more. These elements are put together to form a learning experience that will help you achieve the goals of the Course.
The medium of instruction of the training program will be in English, and all Course content and modules will be in English.
The Student will receive access to an HR representative who will assist with administrative concerns, squad and placement operations, if applicable.

During the Training phase, if you are lagging behind the planned schedule, support can be provided via Code Help only. You will be required to complete the pending requirements in Self-Paced mode and catch up with the schedule to continue receiving mentor support as per original schedule.

COURSE PAUSE OPTION.description: The Course Pause option allows the student to pause the program to attend to any unseen emergency, and facilitates program continuation at a later convenient date.
COURSE PAUSE OPTION.title: Course Pause Terms & Conditions
list: This option can be availed once during the program.
This option can be availed for valid reasons such as college exams, health issues, etc.
To avail this option, an email request has to be sent to HR with details including the reason for availing Course Pause and period of absence.
The period of absence can be for a maximum of 3 months.

When the student wants to resume the program, he/she can choose to join a subsequent batch or resume the program in a self-paced mode. Live session recordings will be provided. Mentor support on ProGrad Slack's code-help channel will be available as before.

If payment is not complete by the specified Course Start Date, you will forfeit your place in the Course.
In case of availing education loans from our partner agencies to purchase the Course, any default or delay in payment will lead to revoking of Course access.
If you are provided an option to pay the Course Fees in instalments, any default or delay in payment according to the instalment payment date(s) will lead to revoking of Course access.

All courses purchased on ProGrad are eligible for a refund at any point from the date of purchase until the last scheduled date of the course. The Course will be prorated and refunded after reducing the following

Any tax-related deductions if applicable (rare case)
